0: The staff were very friendly and greated you at the door
Beautiful hotel great service plenty of activities amazing breakfast
The facility is well cared for and properly staffed
In my last review I mentioned that I would like this location to offer massage services
However the Hilton is by far one of the nicest hotels and provides exceptional service
1: There were ample plugs at the desk area
Although the fitness center pool lobby was under construction the staff ensured us every accommodation

All my friends have enjoyed the yearly weekend at the Hilton To open the holiday season for the past 14 years The staff was excellent as always but the hotel was under remodeling which greatly interfered with our stay no dinning room no fireplaces etc
2: They gave few coffee tickets and free valet parking in compensation of not providing the concierge reception service
First of all we had visited the front desk twice at check in and were never notified

I went to check in at 1030 pm and was met by the desk clerk who stated that since my reservation did not have a Hilton Honors Reward number that her manager had decided to give my room away and make me walk
When I indicated it is listed as free on trip advisor the front desk lady told me she ’d check but my credit card would probably still be billed
The only thing that would sway my review is that the hotel staff charged my hotel room for charges that were meant for another room
Receptionist in evening did not give me good info about getting into airport in morning
If your hungry use Door Dash the food from room service is horrible
My main issue was the food service staff
At check out I was asked if everything had been good with my stay by the very staff person who had changed my room and I reminded him of the problems I had had the first night
After a service call and a visit by a technician it still did not cool the room
